Data.question: Self-Attested Copies Of Ownership Documents/ Sale Deed Etc. Giving The Physical Description Of The Plot/ Property.
Latest Encumbrance Certificate Issued By Registration Department.
Master Plan/ ILUP/ RVM Extract Indicating The Site.
A Declaration Cum Undertaking And Indemnity Bond By The Owner/ LTP
Sign Drawing Plan Pdf And Application Form Of Owner & LTP
Previous Sanctioned Plan copy with details of approval for the existing building if any.
Whether The Land Is Converted Agriculture To Non-Agriculture Land As Per NALA Act, 2006?
